<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Address Runes UTXO</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/btc/{network}/runes/{nameOrId}/addresses/{address}/utxos"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get rune UTXO by address and rune name or ID.

## Request
